Question
========

One study looked at a large number of Dutch couples whose both members work. Suppose the income is *X* of one and *Y* of the other, can we then assume that the variation of total income is equal to σ x^2^ +σ y^2^?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Incorrect
* No: Correct
